mapper.insert: insert into consumer( consumer_id, consumer_name, consumer_password, consumer_nickname, consumer_head, consumer_phoneNumber, consumer_address) values( #{consumer_id}, #{consumer_name}, #{consumer_password}, #{consumer_nickname}, #{consumer_head}, #{consumer_phoneNumber}, #{consumer_address})
mapper.update: update consumer set consumer_name=#{name} where consumer_id=#{id}
update consumer set consumer_password=#{psw} where consumer_id=#{id}
update consumer set consumer_nickname=#{nickname} where consumer_id=#{id}
update consumer set consumer_head=#{head} where consumer_id=#{id}
update consumer set consumer_phoneNumber=#{phoneNumber} where consumer_id=#{id}
